page.title: 05CROOME COURT(2)
page.content: { {Chaitanya College.}It became too expensive to run and in{1985}they sold it for Â£750,000.It was bought by the {Cosima Holdings Co.}who ran a private {Manpower Services Commision}training establishment. This failed and now the court is to be used for a variety of functions including public restaurant, short residential courses, golf and hire for private parties. The building is still of great architectural interest, although some interiors have been sold to the {Metropolitan Museum, New York}and the {Victoria and Albert Museum, London. Of the original estate only{38}acres remains attached to the court. CERI KEMP SARA LORD.
